original_text: So, as much as in me is, I am ready to preach the gospel to you that are at Rome also.
korean_text: 그러므로 나는 할 수 있는 대로 로마에 있는 너희에게도 복음 전하기를 원하노라

sentences.original_text: So, as much as in me is,
I am ready to preach the gospel
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 복음을 전파할 준비가 되어 있고

sentences.original_text: to you that are at Rome also.
